solution_line_template: The TV series has a total of {num_seasons} * {episodes_per_season} = <<{num_seasons}*{episodes_per_season}={total_episodes}>>{total_episodes} episodes
At a rate of {episodes_per_day} episodes per day, Willy will finish the series in {total_episodes} / {episodes_per_day} = {days_to_finish} days.
